duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist cardiothoracic surgeons in surgical procedures and provide patient care before, during, and after surgery.
Participate in emergency medicine cases and provide support in critical care situations.
Assist in surgical procedures, ensuring all necessary equipment, instruments, and supplies are available.
Administer anesthesia and monitor patient vital signs during surgery.
Maintain accurate and detailed medical records for each patient encounter.
Exercise prescriptive authority as authorized within the scope of practice.
Ensure board certification requirements are met and maintained.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physician Assistant Studies or a related field (Master's preferred)
